attributes.action: ensure that the coast of or coutry remains open and free to access for the public at large
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The coastline of our nation should be open and free to access for the public private ownership of sections of our coast should be disallowed unless said owner is willing to guarantee full and un-restricted access to the general public failure to allow access should result in removal of land from said owner , The only exemption to this would be land ALREADY owned by the MOD but NOT new acuasition  land
